Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I\'m an Italian fan of space travel and simulations, I recently discovered Kerbal Space Program and I must say that I\'m enjoying it a lot.

I hope not to make too many mistakes with my bad English.
Welcome to the forums! You english isn\'t bad(atleast not what you wrote here).

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
